content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: ARMCD
      operator: longer_than
      value: 20
Core:
  Id: CORE-000157
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: The length of ARMCD is limited to 20 characters.
Outcome:
  Message: Length of ARMCD is greater than 20
  Output Variables:
    - ARMCD
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0297
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: ARMCD is limited to 20 characters and does not have
                  special character restrictions.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: 7.3.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TV

json.Description: The length of ARMCD is limited to 20 characters.

Outcome.Message: Length of ARMCD is greater than 20

Citations.Cited_Guidance: ARMCD is limited to 20 characters and does not have special character restrictions.
